titleStmt.title: A letter from His Excellency Sir Tho: Fairfax, to the Lord Major, aldermen and Common-Councel of the city of London, from Kingston, Novemb. 19. 1647. To acquaint them with His Excellencies sending Col: Hewson with one thousand foot soldiers to quarter in the city, and the grounds thereof. Nov. 20. 1647. Imprimatur Gilbert Mabbot.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
